text: @DavidBrodyCBN @realDonaldTrump @POTUS It might not be his exact words, but he definitely said something very stupid about coronavirus and disinfectants. It’s on tape, it is NOT a joke, and if it was, what an imbecile joke. He can poop on people and he will always be right. People can be so idiotic.
